channel.title: Digital Credibility on The Cogitating Ceviche

item.title: Why Your Content Needs a Chaperone in the Age of AI
item.description:
There was a time when information traveled with some dignity. It wore a jacket. It took the stairs. It cited sources. Then we handed the keys to generative models, and suddenly half the internet is being summarized, reinterpreted, or hallucinated by…

Read the full article on Substack
